product_desc: Dollarposting.com is intended to be a cheaper and simpler alternative to Ebay and other listing multivendor websites. This site will allow user to post an unlimited amount of ads, listings, and blog article for only a low monthly membership fee with no additional cost or commission fees unlike others sites. With this business model sellers will be able to keep 100% of all their profits from online sales for just one low monthly fee. In addition, this website will randomly select the top rated sellers and bloggers for a monthly prize give away in order to encourage the creation of high quality user generated content. Once the site is fully developed and marketed properly DollarPosting will have the potential to attract a lot of traffic and paid members.
high_concept: An Unique and Competitive Online Marketplace
name: DollarPosting
